bibl.title: The Hapless Recruit Psois and the Mighty Anchorite, Apa John.
bibl.note: I. The Finger and the Seal of Psois of Pouchis. P. Herm. Rees 7, 17-20 and an aspect of the recruitment procedure under the Later Empire. - II. Anchorite John. A survey of the Greek and Coptic archive of the anchorite John and an identification: Apa John and John of Lycopolis are one and the same person.
ZUCKERMAN Constantine, The Hapless Recruit Psois and the Mighty Anchorite, Apa John.
